subject: African Cup of Nations (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: Emmanuel Adebayor, the captain of Togo’s national team, retired from international play, saying he is “still haunted” by the deadly attack on his team at the African Cup of Nations in January.
snippet: Emmanuel Adebayor, the captain of Togo’s national team, retired from international play, saying he is “still haunted” by the deadly attack on his team at the African Cup of Nations in January.
